meta.title: CFP Land
meta.description: Calls for Proposals, Tech Conferences, and Speaking Tips
meta.author: Karl L. Hughes

data.name: JuneteenthConf
data.description: The Mission of JuneteenthConf is to provide a judgement free space for underrepresented people in tech to learn and grow and to amplify their voices. To be a counterbalance to the biases, implicit or otherwise, that hold our industry and our society back.
